alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Leake; Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Leake, western Kemper and Neshoba Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Gholson to near Burnside to near Singleton. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Philadelphia and Pearl River around 720 PM CDT. Carthage and De Kalb around 725 PM CDT. Dixon and Bethsaida around 730 PM CDT. Neshoba, Liberty and Blackwater around 735 PM CDT. Tuscola and Prismatic around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Tucker, Walnut Grove, Redwater and Standing Pine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and east central Mississippi.
